SEARCH
Package com.app.game.service.impl

Class PlayerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.game.service.impl.PlayerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerService
@Service public class PlayerServiceImpl extends Object implements PlayerService
Service implementation for managing player-related operations.

This class provides methods for adding, removing, finding, and saving players, as well as generating rankings and filtering players by specific periods.

    • getTheBestPlayerInPeriod

      public List<Player> getTheBestPlayerInPeriod(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Retrieves the best player(s) within a specific time period.
      Specified by:
      getTheBestPlayerInPeriod in interface PlayerService
      Parameters:
      from - the start date of the period
      to - the end date of the period
      Returns:
      a list of Player objects with the highest score in the specified period
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if from or to is null, or if from is after to

    • getRankingOfPlayers

      public Map<Integer,Set<String>> getRankingOfPlayers()
      Generates a ranking of players based on their best scores.
      Specified by:
      getRankingOfPlayers in interface PlayerService
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the score and the value is a set of player logins, sorted in descending order by score
